description: Voice-based assistant that listens for user input and responds. Demonstrates the listen tool for human-in-the-loop voice interaction.

cells.name: greet
cells.instructions: Greet the user and let them know you're ready to listen to their question. Keep it brief and friendly.

cells.name: listen_input
cells.instructions: Use the listen tool to get voice input from the user. Set an appropriate prompt message like 'Please speak your question now...'

cells.name: respond
cells.instructions:
Respond to the user's voice input.

The user said:
{{ outputs.listen_input }}

Provide a helpful response to their question or request. If the voice input had an error, acknowledge it and suggest they try again.
